title: High Fertilizer Consumption
description: In 2022, Estonia's fertilizer consumption was 22,973.71% of its production, indicating a significant reliance on imported fertilizers.

title: Low Carbon Emissions from Waste
description: Estonia's carbon dioxide emissions from waste were a mere 0.0001 Mt CO2e in 2023, showcasing its effective waste management practices.

title: Efficient Industrial Water Use
description: In 2021, 92.29% of Estonia's total freshwater withdrawals were used by the industry, highlighting its efficient water management in industrial sectors.

title: High Quality of Public Services
description: By 2024, Estonia scored 84.97 in the Business Location Pillar 2, reflecting the high quality and transparency of public services for businesses.

title: Transparent Utility Services
description: Estonia achieved a score of 82.58 in 2024 for the quality of governance and transparency in utility services, indicating robust infrastructure management.

title: Minimal Nonresident Patent Applications
description: In 2021, Estonia had only 1 patent application from nonresidents, suggesting limited foreign interest in patenting within the country.

title: Limited ODA to Least Developed Countries
description: Estonia provided $490,000 in net ODA to the least developed countries in 2022, indicating a relatively low level of financial support.

title: Low Standard Error in Corruption Control
description: In 2023, Estonia had a standard error of 0.145 in its control of corruption, reflecting consistent governance efforts.
